name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ezcmac, Zefiel, stanshall, riotdejaneiro, DiamondMonster, lamelliform, atticusonline, CanusDivinus, willt, lk, anewcede, Doc_Rostov, yingkaixing, SenseiHollywood, STUART)

name: sargasm
text: Bert and Ernie are puppet characters on the children's show Sesame Street.  Eating dolls of them is what a crazy person does.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: And sucking on them and the filth they've absorbed is what a baby does... either way

name: jeet
text: Those babies are so insane.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Sometimes, but mostly just incompetent like Ray

name: songbirdspectre
text: Incompetent Babies are my Favorite Babies.

name: deusoma
text: Stupid babies need the most attention.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
What? No nomination for Greatest Band Name Evar?


Maybe because it hits too close to home, hmmm?

name: shinkusan
text: Sometimes, but mostly just your avatar.

name: bobbieluvsya
text: Gotta love the post-avatar synchronicity.

name: cdl146
text: Does Ray always keep his keys in his thong?

name: featurelessvoid
text: Where else would he keep them?  Where else, I ask you.  Wait, I mean I ask you rhetorically.  Please, nobody start trying to answer this question with fan art.

name: kledermans
text: That must get hella scratchy.

name: stuart
text: It feels like a bee damn stung me on my Gentleness!

name: soticoto
text: A Prince Albert might initially seem like a convenient way of storing keys, but it becomes another tale entirely when those keys must be used to open doors.

name: blarghamagarky
text:
hehehehhe

keynis

name: fallow_fields
text: A comment left by fallow_fields was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, daidai, riotdejaneiro, wildcat, sex_bicycle, Carpetbag, TonyHighwind, mercuri0us, whoper, trisha)

name: tekende
text:
Oh man
That is mega nasty
That is dog shit

name: stubob
text: I think that is my old neighbor. He'd be all nude and yelling for help out of his apartment when he fell out of bed.  We'd be all drunk and trying to help him... Eventually his family put him in a home.  The end.

name: fineoakstructure
text: No moral.

name: carlyle
text:
No, there was a moral. Don't ask for drunk people's help.

Actually, it might be more along the lines of "put yourself in a home before someone has to do it for you"

name: n0umena
text: put that shit away

name: anitrophaeron
text: It is entirely possible to spend all of ones' euros on a single soda.  Much as I like Europe, it pains me to leave the land where I can get a 378 oz. soda at mcdonald's for twelve cents.

name: i_love_kate
text: Ein Mantel, bitte. Fur wie vielen euro?! Gute Nacht!

name: werthog42
text:
Für wie viele Euro?
Alternately, Für wie viel Geld?

name: i_love_kate
text: You win this round.

name: songbirdspectre
text: I'm sorry. I don't speak Spanish.

name: charchar
text:
*Yo quiero estrar sobre ti. = I want to be on you.
* Me llamo ...., y me gusta comidas. = My name is... and I like food.
That is ye know on this earth, and that is all you need to know.

name: shirt145
text: I believe you mean estar and me gustaN comidas.  Also, this does not work.

name: charchar
text: Alright, I'll come clean; I've never studied Spanish. I lived in Texas for three years and my best friend is Puerto Rican, and I'm studying Swedish for some reason.

name: i_love_kate
text:
High five for not knowing why you're studying the languages you're studying!

Seriously, Japanese and German? Wtf? In retrospect, the only like I can think of between these languages is that during WW2 they would have been associated mainly with the Axis.

name: i_love_kate
text: Like = link, desu ne.

name: shirt145
text: link ga arimasu.

name: genequagmire
text: Those are my chosen languages as well, but there exists well developed logic behind my choices.  Presumably.

name: i_love_kate
text: C... Can I borrow it?

name: mashisoyo
text: Yeah, those are my second and third languages too! The Axis thing did occur to me, but it's not why I chose them. I just like sushi and guttural sounds.

name: fattypneumonia
text: "Donde... donde esta EL HOTEL WE WERESTAYINGAT???"

name: drago25
text:
Man he was only drinking soda all that time? disappointing
Slip some Ketel One or something in there, homey

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Ray spent all day drinking sodas instead of alcohol? Europe really changes a person.
